oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han=kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Personal information about a man called kkuirri-ttu (|han=kass'o's uncle) who was killed by a white man over some missing oxen. 1) This story is found in Book VIII-11.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Note on kkuirri-ttu
